,,, |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = default |manuf = Runtop |manuf_model = GVA224A |manuf_rev = Rev VV |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = EoL |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 08/2009 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Invalid FCC ID: NKRCMA ([[Wistron NeWeb]]) *"A/N:GPCVA224A-000-VV311", "P/N:GVA224A Rev.VV" and "START:2008/01/09" are silkscreened on base board. *"A/N:GPCVA224A-SOD-VV300, "P/N:GVA224A Rev.VV" and "START:2007/09/17" are silkscreened on SLIC daughter board. Per the Ethernet OUI, this is a '''Runtop''' device. ==Links of Interest== *[ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/200/200AE2_QuickStartGuide.pdf Quick Start Guide]
[ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/200/200AE2_HardwareInstallationGuide.pdf Hardware Installation Guide] *https://abcconf.com/store/pc/catalog/ED-EM-200AE2-AE401_Detail.jpg ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:Edgewater 200AE2 Internal.jpeg|Internal view File:Edgewater 200AE2 Main top.jpeg|Top of main board File:Edgewater 200AE2 Main bottom.jpeg|Bottom of main board board File:Edgewater 200AE2 Phone Top.jpeg| Top of phone board File:Edgewater 200AE2 Phone bottom.jpeg| Bottom of phone board
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==Notes== *Integrated ADSL2+ DSL modem works with all ADSL providers :(''AT&T, Verizon, Centurylink, Qwest, Bell, Acanac, Teksavvy'') *Integrated 4 port managed Ethernet switch with VLAN support. *Integrated VoIP (SIP and H.323) FXS and FXO ports. *Management: HTTP, HTTPS, SSH, Telnet, SNMPv1 and V3. ==See also== *[[Edgewater Networks EdgeMarc 250AE]] â€¢ [https://www.thetelecomspot.com/edgewater-networks-edgemarc-250w-2-port-enterprise-session-border-contoller-8-lanplus-1-wan-adsl-or-ethernet-plus-4-fxs-1-fxo-plus-802-11-wap-250w-100-0002.html ''EdgeMarc 200 Series'' spec.] :''EdgeMarc EM-250AE - 8-Port Enterprise Session Border Contoller'' :8x LAN, 1x WAN (ADSL or Ethernet), 4x FXS/1x FXO :;EdgeMarc 200 Series comparison {| class="wikitable sortable" cellpadding="3px" style="border: 1px solid black; border-spacing: 0px; width: 60%; text-align:center;" ! 1x FE || 1x ADSL2+,
1x FE || 1x ADSL2+,

Wi-Fi | 802.11abg || 802.11abg || - || - || 802.11bgn |- ! Serial Port | 1x Male DB9 || 1x Male DB9 || 1x Male DB9 || 1x Male DB9 || - |- ! Power | 12V/3A || 12V/3A || 12V/3A || 12V/1.5A || 12V/3A |- !
